featured.text: In the keen competition of this international tennis tournament, she ________ won the championship.
While one person enjoys playing seventy-two holes of golf a week, another would rather play three sweaty, competitive games of tennis.
her ankle while she was playing tennis last week.

definition.zh_def: 一種在矩形場地上進行的球類運動，通常由兩名或四名選手使用球拍擊打網球。
definition.en_def: A sport played on a rectangular court, typically by two or four players, who use rackets to hit a tennis ball.
definition.example: She plays tennis every Saturday with her friends.
